project.name: nme
project.description: NME stands for Neko Media Engine and is an SDL wrapper for the haXe and Neko platforms. It also supports a subset of the flash9 drawing API, for vector and bitmap drawing. Currently supports Windows, Mac (intel), Linux and iPhone
project.version: Added iPhone support. Unified hxcpp and neko ports. Moved to hxcpp BuildTool for compaltion. Use specially build static libraries for sdl etc.
